edu.illinois.mitra.starl.models

Class Model_Ground

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.objects.ItemPosition
      • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.models.Model
        • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.models.Model_Ground
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Traceable, java.lang.Comparable<ItemPosition>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Model_iRobot

    public abstract class Model_Ground
extends Model
    This class represents all ground models that have zero-point turning. It uses velocity and angle parameters, and provides methods predict(), updatePos(), inMotion(), collision(), and updateSensor() used in other classes. Subclasses must override the abstract methods, making sure each returns a constant value.
    See Also:
    Model
